headline: How Disney’s Kimmel controversy highlights linear TV’s fragility
summary: Disney’s fallout over Jimmy Kimmel’s suspension exposed the growing fragility of broadcast TV and renewed calls for the company to shed legacy networks like ABC as it doubles down on streaming.

raw.headline: How Disney’s Kimmel controversy highlights linear TV’s fragility
raw.summary: Disney’s fallout over Jimmy Kimmel’s suspension exposed the growing fragility of broadcast TV and renewed calls for the company to shed legacy networks like ABC as it doubles down on streaming.

headline: "Jimmy Kimmel Live!" to Return to Nexstar’s ABC Affiliated Television Stations
summary: IRVING, Texas, September 26, 2025--Nexstar Media Group, Inc. (NASDAQ: NXST), today announced that "Jimmy Kimmel Live!" will return to the company’s owned and partner television stations affiliated with the ABC Television Network beginning tonight.

raw.headline: "Jimmy Kimmel Live!" to Return to Nexstar’s ABC Affiliated Television Stations
raw.summary: IRVING, Texas, September 26, 2025--Nexstar Media Group, Inc. (NASDAQ: NXST), today announced that "Jimmy Kimmel Live!" will return to the company’s owned and partner television stations affiliated with the ABC Television Network beginning tonight.

headline: Sinclair ends Kimmel boycott: What this illustrates about linear TV
summary: Sinclair Broadcast Group (SBGI) ended its boycott of ABC's Jimmy Kimmel Live! on Friday after the titular late night host returned from his suspension on Tuesday. Earlier this week, the broadcast company teamed with Nexstar Media Group (NXST) to air news over the show on their local stations. Yahoo Finance senior media reporter Allie Canal highlights linear TV's fragility in this case of broadcaster backlash. LightShed Partners media analyst Rich Greenfield made the case to Yahoo Finance as to why Disney (DIS) could spin-off ABC. Hear why Needham & Company's Laura Martin thinks Disney should just shut down ABC in an interview with Yahoo Finance earlier this week. Plex CEO Keith Valory also commented that media companies have a "moral obligation" to uphold free speech practices against government pressures. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.

headline: Paramount, Ellisons might not have the cash for a WBD bid: Analyst
summary: Paramount Skydance (PSKY) has had its sights set on an acquisition of media competitor Warner Bros. Discovery (WBD), according to reports from earlier this month, but has yet to submit a buyout bid for the HBO Max parent company. Paramount Skydance CEO David Ellison is the son of Oracle (ORCL) co-founder and chairman Larry Ellison. LightShed Partners partner and media & technology analyst Rich Greenfield sits down with Market Catalysts host Julie Hyman for a conversation on whether a Paramount buyout of Warner Bros. is coming or not. Also hear Rick Greenfield's comments on why Disney (DIS) could be better off spinning off ABC over broadcaster backlash to Jimmy Kimmel. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

headline: Should Disney spin off ABC over Kimmel broadcast pressures?
summary: Jimmy Kimmel Live! returned to ABC airways on Tuesday after being temporarily suspended for the late night host's political comments following the assassination of Charlie Kirk. Nexstar Media Group (NXST) and Sinclair Broadcast Group (SBGI) have united in boycotting Jimmy Kimmel's show from broadcasting on their local station. LightShed Partners partner and media & technology analyst Rich Greenfield weighs in on Disney's (DIS) ownership of ABC while facing broadcast pressures. Hear why Needham & Company's Laura Martin thinks Disney should just shut down ABC in an interview with Yahoo Finance earlier this week. Plex CEO Keith Valory also commented that media companies have a "moral obligation" to uphold free speech practices against government pressures. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.
